org.upmc.electisim.utils

Class CircularBuffer<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.upmc.electisim.utils.CircularBuffer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type contained in the data structure
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StateBuffer

    public class CircularBuffer<T>
extends java.lang.Object

    A general purpose implementation of the circular buffer data structure. The structure has a capacity, and if this capacity is reached, it wraps and erases the elements found.

    This data structure is used as the underlying structure of the StateBuffer used to keep track the states of the simulation.
